item.title: Why Bambi?
item.description: Introduction I’ve been thinking about writing a new blog post for a while now, and it was just a few hours ago that I realized I could write about something quite curious that happened to me while trying to replicate a Bambi model with PyMC3.

item.title: How to generate bingo cards in R
item.description: Hello wor… Well, my first hello world post appeared about a year ago, but this site had the same fate as many of my othe side-projects… abandonment.
